How to Update TradingView Indicator

  1. Click "Copy All Values" or click individual prices
  2. Open your TradingView chart with PH|UGS indicator
  3. Open indicator settings (gear icon)
  4. Go to "Gamma Exposure (GEX) Levels" section
  5. Paste each value into the corresponding field
